subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: In a ruling that could lead to the downfall of more high-level officials, FIFA barred Temarii for eight years for taking money from one of the backers of Qatar’s World Cup bid.
snippet: In a ruling that could lead to the downfall of more high-level officials, FIFA barred Temarii for eight years for taking money from one of the backers of Qatar’s World Cup bid.
